pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with His Highness Sheikh Mohammed bin Zayed Al Nahyan, Crown Prince of Abu Dhabi and Deputy Supreme Commander of the Armed Forces of the United Arab Emirates | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Today, Prime Minister Justin Trudeau spoke with His Highness Sheikh Mohammed bin Zayed Al Nahyan of the United Arab Emirates.

The Crown Prince expressed his condolences to the Prime Minister for the Canadians who lost their lives in the Ukraine International Airlines tragedy. The two leaders discussed the need for a thorough and credible international investigation and the importance of respecting the needs and wishes of the families of the victims.

In reviewing recent developments in the region, Prime Minister Trudeau and the Crown Prince agreed on the fundamental importance of de-escalation and dialogue to ease tensions and promote security and stability.  The two leaders looked forward to staying in touch and to continued cooperation on matters of regional security.
